# caliper

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/klbarnes20/caliper/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/klbarnes20/caliper/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->


The goal of caliper is to provide tools to aid in The Carpentries assessment work. This package is a work in progress. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of caliper from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("klbarnes20/caliper")
```
